name: chicly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is stylish and fashionable: They saw a small, chicly dressed woman in a black skirt with a black sweater over a white blouse. The room was furnished with chicly shabby mismatched furniture.
More examplesFewer examplesHe photographed chicly dressed New Yorkers parading down Fifth Avenue.Her style was chicly casual, pairing plain trousers with signature tops.The set was a chicly minimalist, almost monochrome design.They were nostalgic for the Paris of chicly dressed intellectuals.
